#text=Today I rode the public bus to work as I usually do .
#text=Because I ride several busses daily , I had previously purchased a bus pass that allows unlimited use for the month .
#text=By having this pass I did n't need to worry about having proper change or tokens for the bus .
#text=I checked the schedule for my bus by using '' `` Google Maps '' '' and determined that my regular bus was on schedule .
#text=I walked to the bus stop and saw that my bus was several blocks away .
#text=When the bus arrived I boarded it after several other passengers , and then slid my pass through the card reader .
#text=There were several seats available and I selected the first one I came to .
#text=The bus continued on schedule along the route with passengers departing and boarding .
#text=When I arrived at work I gathered all of my personal belongings and disembarked .
